name: Hands Off! (matthewkayin)
description: In a world inhabited by hands, victory in combat is considered the greatest of honors. Because of this, hands spend years mastering the ancient arts of rock, paper, and scissors. But legend tells of the power of the fingergun, which can grant the user immesurable power. You have found this power, and now everyone's out to get you. You must use the power to defend yourself, or get touched, and face defeat.
